name: Chain Lightning
effect: A bolt of blue lightning leaps from your outstretched hand to a an enemy within range, and then to an additional enemy within 10 feet, if there is one. All targets take 1d8 lightning damage.

modifiers.targets: The lightning strikes one additional target per point of intelligence above 15.
modifiers.Damage: The lightning deals one additional damage per point of charisma above 15.
